attributes.action: do not use disgusting pictures on cigarette packets to stop people smoking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are going to see graphic pictures on cigarette packets soon and its a disgrace not only to the smokers but also the non smokers who will have to see it every day. We dont need this because its not nice to see gruesome and disturbing pictures in witch some people do smoke.

So we urge the government not to insert graphic and disgusting pictures and help smokers to quit more in the nhs.
